game.name: Foot Surgery
game.description:
The foot of a cute girl has got injured. Her families have taken her to the hospital where they found no doctors. Suddenly they thought of you who are their family doctor. So they rushed her to your clinic where you are treating other patients. Leave all patients and get ready to give an urgent surgery to this girl who is in severe foot pain! It means that you are playing the role of a foot doctor in this brand new online game.

It will be your responsibility to perform a successful surgery on the foot injuries of a small girl in Foot Surgery game. Make sure that her injuries get treated on time and she will be able to walk again with a happy face. Take a look at the tools that you can use to get rid of the tiny parasites that generally cause multiple irritations and itches in this brand new html5 surgery game! Collect a cotton ball and disinfect the foot properly and then eliminate the harming bacteria using a syringe!

Inject the food using some substances to remove the blood cists accumulated on the surface of the foot! Use the laser to eliminate some varicose veins and you will soon find that your patient is ready to walk on her feet normally! Be ready to give her a perfect manicure after one week of proper medical treatment! Good luck to clean, disinfect and fix other body parts in our other popular surgery games for kids! All the best for sending all your patients with a cheerful recovery!!
